description:
Data and scripts required to fit colonization-extinction models and to run simulations presented in Moor et al. 2020 J Ecol.

Scripts use RData files; data is also available i CSV file format.
title: Data and code from: Long-term effects of colonization-extinction dynamics of generalist versus specialist wood-decaying fungi

creators.name: Helen Moor, Jenni Nordén, Reijo Penttilä, Juha Siitonen, Tord Snäll
